execution_quality: Agent executed the PR creation process efficiently, running git commands to check status, view changes, and create/push the PR, but encountered a critical blocker when the PR creation command failed due to missing branch tracking.
work_category: Git workflow execution: creating and pushing a pull request with staged changes to remote repository.
summary: Agent attempted to fulfill a straightforward PR creation request but failed to complete the task due to the current branch not tracking a remote. The agent identified the error but did not recover by pushing with the -u flag before attempting PR creation, leaving the work incomplete. The empty follow-up message suggests the user may have abandoned the interaction or expected the agent to resolve the blocking issue autonomously.
follow_up_pattern: Task interrupted mid-execution; PR creation failed with branch not tracking remote. Expected either user to provide guidance on fixing the branch tracking issue or agent to recover by pushing branch with -u flag first.
